title: 57. Milking, quilting, gardening and bees with Vanessa from Crafty Gemini
description:
In today's episode I'm chatting with Vanessa from Crafty Gemini on everything from worming goats to shipping mangos. You can follow along with Vanesa on Instagram, Youtube, her blog and Facebook. 

Check out some of these resources that she mentioned in the interview:

• How to Milk a Cow Tutorial:  https://craftygemini.com/2019/01/how-to-milk-a-cow-video-tutorial.html

• Confetti Charm Quilt Along Video (beginner friendly quilt): https://youtu.be/ueUtaPJPpMg

• Confetti Charm Quilt FREE PDF pattern: https://craftygemini.com/shop/confetti-charm-quilt-pdf-pattern/

• Blox Quilt Along (3- video series for another beginner friendly quilt): https://craftygemini.com/bloxquiltalong/
dc:creator: Lisa Bass
